snippet.title: Lying Souls™ Demo - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Lying Souls™ Demo - Official Reveal Trailer - Troxy Studios

Lying Souls is an atmospheric, mysterious single player story horror game. You'll dive into a story in which nothing is as it seems. Find out the reasons behind what happened to your family back then. Your decisions will guide the the story. 

On Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1574110/Lying_Souls/

Follow us:
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/StudiosTroxy
Discord: https://discord.gg/8k7U5T9
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/troxystudios/

LYING SOULS™ © 2018 - 2021 TROXY STUDIOS ALL RIGHTS RESERVED
